DGNM program was started in the year 1996 and later courses like B SC in Nursing were initiated. All these programs were designed to train the students with latest techniques and methodologies in the nursing education.

Admission to the UG courses offered by the institute is done based on the candidate’s performance in the previous qualifying examination, whereas for MBA course admission is done based on the candidate’s performance in the national level management entrance examination such as CAT/ MAT/ XAT.

Quantum school of business, which has been ranked no. 1 B-school of Uttarakhand was founded in 2008. The collage is located on the bank of river Ganga. Vision of the college is to create Excellence in Applied Research, with high quality education in Engineering, Management and allied areas.The college is affiliated to Uttarakhand Technical University and is approved by AICTE. The college is just 22 km away from Mandawar thereby providing easy transportation.  The collage is ranked as no. 1 MBA College in Uttrakhand and no.29 in North India according to ‘the week magazine.

This institution understands the need for well-trained teachers who will have the expertise to various methods of approach to imparting education to students. They aim at helping the society to face a time of change that will create a very new look to itself. This institution is a small part of Surajmal Agarwal trust which has been established with the aim of making education available to all. AIIMS Rishikesh is one of the six AIIMS in India. AIIMS Rishikesh has ranked 22nd best medical college by NIRF Ranking 2023. The institute is recognized by the Medical Council of India (MCI). The institute offers UG, PG, Diplomas, Fellowships and Doctoral courses with various specializations. There is a total of 45 departments offering admission to students in 40+ courses in streams such as Nursing, Medical, AYUSH and Paramedical.

College_Summary: Dev Sanskriti Vishwavidyalaya is a private university located in the holy city of Haridwar. University is managed by Shri Vedmata Gayatri Trust. University provides diploma, degree and certificate courses in fields like Indian Culture, Alternative Therapy, Rural Management, theology, Tourism, Spiritual counselling etc. University was established with the objective of spreading principles of Indian culture and to provide education and research in the field of Dev Sanskriti and promoting a proper combination of science and spirituality. Dev Sanskriti  Vishwavidyalaya faculty is experts in their respective fields. The faculty is friendly with their students and help them in their personal and professional level both.

Gurukula Kangri Vishwavidyalaya (GKV), Haridwar is a public university established in 1902, accredited by NAAC and recognized by UGC. The university offers various Diploma, Undergraduate, Postgraduate and Research level programs across multiple disciplines such as Commerce, Management, Science, Education, Computer Application, Pharmacy, Humanities etc.

HNBGU is a central university of Garhwal, Uttarakhand. The university offers UG, PG, UG Diploma, PG Diploma and Research Programmes under several disciplines. HNBGU has 11 schools under various domains.

Kumaun University is a well-recognized state and residential cum affiliating University in Nanital offering a large variety of 29 undergraduate and postgraduate courses such as B.A., B.Sc., M.A., M.Sc., M.B.A., etc. The most basic eligibility criteria for taking admission into the UG and PG courses is to complete 10+2 level board and Bachelor’s degree examinations respectively. Check Kumaun University Courses

The Kumaun University is one of the renowned universities of the country. It is famous for its academic brilliance in providing technical, professional and vocational education to the students over the years.

Uttarakhand Open University (UOU) is a state-open university in Haldwani, Uttarakhand, India. Established in 2005 by the Uttarakhand Legislative Assembly, UOU is recognized by the DEB, UGC, and AIU. UOU offers more than 80 programs in its 90 centers with 13 established schools.

Uttarakhand Technical University was established in the year 2005 in Dehradun. UTU is a public university that is approved by UGC and is the only affiliating University of the state for technical institutions. Apart from this, the University is having 8 Constituent Colleges.

Uttarakhand Sanskrit University was established on the 21st of April 2005 by the Government of Uttarakhand in an attempt to propagate Sanskrit and Oriental language and connect them with modern context. Uttarakhand Sanskrit University currently has more 44 colleges affiliated to it with the goal of conservation and promotion oriental education.

The college offers undergraduate and postgraduate programs in the discipline of Arts, Commerce, Education, Computer Application and Management. Admissions is done on the basis of CAT/CMAT/MAT/GMAT scores. Nimbus has strong industry tie-ups for the benefit of the students to gain practical knowledge of the business processes. Additionally, various multinational companies regularly visit the campus for placements.

Uttarakhand Ayurved University (UAU) is the only AYUSH University in Uttarakhand established in 2009 at Dehradun by the Government of Uttarakhand. Uttarakhand Ayurved University was established to promote learning, teaching, and applications of basic sciences in the field of AYUSH and evidence-based medicine. The university offers various academic courses across seven faculties namely Ayurveda, Homeopathy, Unani, Siddha, Yoga and Naturopathy, Bio-Medical Sciences, and Pharmaceutical Sciences.

MBBS, MD, and MS are the courses offered by GMC Haldwani.

IIRS offers various graduate courses as well as Post Graduate courses. Participants above 30,000 have benefitted so far from IIRS Outreach Programmes. College_Summary: Servo Hospitality School (SHS), Dehradun established in 2018 offers UG and Diploma and short-term Courses along with paid internships to global avenues such as Australia, Canada, China, etc. Servo Hospitality School offers a 6-month Finishing School Program to help students polish their visual image, grooming, communication skills, manners, and etiquette, to let their personality do the talking. Servo Hospitality School has partnered with OTHM, United Kingdom, and offers 3 years International Graduate Diploma Program (Levels 4, 5, 6), equivalent to a 3 years UK Bachelor’s degree. This can be upgraded through the “Pathways Program”, which gives students the flexibility to complete the third year (level 6) from the partner institution in Greece (the Mediterranean College) or partner colleges in Switzerland (IMI or HTMi), at an additional fee, and avail of a bachelor’s degree from the overseas institution. The institute is recognized as the “Finest Hotel Management Institute in India, 2023'. The institute received International Gold Standards Qualification in Hospitality & Culinary domain, from one of the Finest Hospitality Educator/Body, renowned for its high end learning deliverance worldwide, 'CTH - Confederation of Tourism & Hospitality, United Kingdom. The added qualifications offered to the students are Level 4 Diploma in Hospitality Management, Level 2 Diploma in Culinary Skills and Level 2 Diploma in Patisserie and Confectionery Skills. On successful completion of the Level 4 Diploma at SHS, the student has the option to gain advancement to a number of universities worldwide such as in United Kingdom, Canada, Austrasia, Malaysia, Switzerland, New Zealand, U.A.E, China. Students also have the option of pursuing their International Internship/Job Placement with the leading 4/5 star hotel property located at  Maldives, Mauritius, Dubai, Qatar, Kuwait, Oman, Bahrain, Fujairah, Ras Al Khaimah, U.A.E, on successful completion of their Level 2 & 4 Diploma.

Admissions to the courses are offered on the basis of marks secured in the previous qualifying examination.

The university is offering a wide range of courses at both undergraduate and postgraduate level in Physiotherapy, Paramedical, Arts, Commerce, Nursing, Hotel Management, Polytechnic, Education, etc across various specializations. The admissions to RBBSU are both entrance and merit based.

College_Summary: Government Polytechnic Dwarahat is situated in the rural area of Almora district. This Co-ed college has an area of ten acres with green environment. A total of 7 diploma courses are offered in the college. The college aims to impart quality education in the field of Engineering and Technology, Pharmacy and Management. Shrinagar Garwal Board of Technical Education (Roorkee, Haridwar) conducts all institutional annual/ semester exams. It has well equipped labs, Computer Centre, and library to help students in attaining highest standards in their academical and professional life.

Government polytechnic Kulsari (GPK) is one of the best institutes providing technical education in Chamoli. The institute was established in 2013 and it is approved by AICTE, New Delhi. It is affiliated with the Directorate of Technical Education (DTE). This institute offers a diploma course in civil engineering. The institute aims at the overall development of individual students in terms of technical education. The institute is recognized by the Uttarakhand Board of Technical Education, Roorkee and follows the norms and rules of the same. Admission for the Government polytechnic Kulsari is based on the UBTER JEEP exam conducted by UBTER.

Government Polytechnic Dehradun (GPD) is recognized by the Uttarakhand Board of Technical Education (UBTER) and approved by the Government of India. GDP has been ranked amongst the Best Polytechnic Colleges of North India. The college campus is span over an area of about 20 acres of land. GDP is the leading Polytechnic Institute which offers diploma programmes in various streams like Engineering and Pharmacy. Admission to the diploma courses are done through UBTER JEEP entrance examination.

College_Summary: Himalayiya University, Dehradun is one of the best universities recognized by the All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE), New Delhi. The university offers various undergraduate and postgraduate courses in the discipline of Management, Hotel Management, Arts, Information Technology and many more.

Avlon Academy, Dehradun was established in the year 2008. It is one of the topmost AirHostess training institutes of Uttarakhand and the leading Airhostess Training Institute of North India. It is the first academy in Uttarakhand which is an affiliated training partner of the Aerospace and Aviation Sector Skill Council (AASSC). Avlon Academy is awarded the “Uttarakhand Ratan Award '' for its Excellent training and placements in Aviation. The institute offers a total of 24 courses under PG, UG, and Diploma & Certificate Courses in the discipline of Aviation, Hospitality, Travel & Tourism, Retail, and Fashion Designing. The admission procedures for UG and PG courses are done on the basis of merit/marks.

As of now, Government Polytechnic Bans only offers 1 course, a diploma in Civil Engineering. The admission related proceedings are done by keeping in mind the ranking secured in the Uttarakhand Polytechnic (JEEP) exam. The placements at the college will be based on the skill set developed by each student.

College_Summary: Beehive Group of Colleges was established in 2002. The college is approved by AICTE, Ministry of HRD, NCTE. The institute has 4 institutions under its umbrella providing education across various streams.

UIHMT Group of Colleges, Dehradun is affiliated to HNB Uttarakhand Medical Education University, Sri Dev Suman Uttarakhand University and HNB Garhwal University (Central University). The institution is approved by Govt. of Uttarakhand and recognised by INC. It offers undergraduate, postgraduate, diploma and certificate courses in the disciplines of Hotel Management, Nursing, Paramedical.

International Maritime Business Academy (IMBA) is a private institute that offers courses in the shipping industry established in Dehradun, Uttarakhand. IMBA Dehradun has been awarded “The Best Commercial Shipping Academy of the Year”. The institute offers a BBA in Maritime Business Management at the undergraduate level. IMBA Dehradun offers PGDM programs at the postgraduate level in Maritime Logistics & Port Management, Supply Chain & Logistics Management and International Trade & Maritime Law. IMBA Dehradun PGDM courses are affiliated with Sri Dev Suman University, Uttarakhand. It has partnerships with the University of Plymouth and Rushmore Business School. IMBA Dehradun offers 100% placement assistance. Some of the international placement partners are Sharaf Shipping Agency, Marcura, Inter Ocean, TransBulk, etc. Interested candidates have to fill out an application form and appear for the Personal Interview.

College_Summary: Guru Nanak College of Medical Science and Hospital, Dehradun is approved by AICTE and offers various courses like B.Pharma, D.Pharma, B.Sc. Optometry. These courses are designed to introduce the students with the properties and impact of pharmaceutical drugs. Admission to the courses offered by GNCMH is done based on the candidate’s performance in the last qualifying examination.

RCP Universe Group of Institutions, established in 2004, is a private college affiliated to Sri Dev Suman Uttarakhand University, Uttarakhand Technical University and HNB Garhwal University. The college offers various undergraduate, postgraduate and diploma courses in the discipline of Medical, Commerce, Arts, Science, Management, Education and Pharmacy.

Six Sigma Institute of Technology and Science is the premier institute of Uttarakhand offering Diploma in Engineering as well as in Pharmacy. Admission to the Diploma courses offered by SSITS is done based on the candidate's performance in the previous qualifying examination.
